bio: When Sandi Inspirits you, the two of you will play in your dreams. It's too fun to ever wake up from.

soultimate.name: Unwaking Dream
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops all foes' stats by 15% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: Attack to decrease foes' stats (all) for a time.

skill.effect: All stats temporarily up after being revived.
skill.name: Sludge Grudge

name: Sandi
